### NA去掉之后，剩下的empty cell是“ ”，需要把modelclean完之后再一起删掉有“ ”的obs

```{r cars}
data <-read.csv('/Users/huiwang/Downloads/vehicles.csv')
head(data)
```

```{r}
data$posting_date <- round_date(as.Date(data$posting_date),"day")
data1 <- data %>%
  mutate(cylinders_num = as.numeric(gsub("[^0-9]","",cylinders))) %>%
  select(id,price,year,manufacturer,model,condition,cylinders_num,fuel,odometer,title_status,transmission,drive,size,state,posting_date) %>%
  na.omit()
```
